full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Disposal of MV Holiday Island
### Statement of Tender ID and Reference
*Tender ID:* PW-_MER-002-28823
*Tender Reference:* T2012-220070/A

### Tender Closures
*Publication Date:* September 27, 2022
*Tender Closing Date:* October 31, 2022 2:00 PM EDT

### Tender Description
The Department of Transport Canada invites all interested suppliers to submit a bid for the disposal of MV Holiday Island. The Contractor shall prepare the vessel for transfer, transfer the vessel to the approved site, and subsequently break (dismantle and dispose or recycle) the vessel in an efficient and environmentally responsible manner in accordance with the Statement of Work.

### Tender Requirements
*The Contractor shall have until November 30, 2022 to remove the vessel from the Transport Canada-owned ferry terminal at Wood Islands, Prince Edward Island
*The Contractor shall complete the Work by February 28, 2024
*The Contractor shall comply with the Basel Convention on the Control of Transboundary Movements of Hazardous Wastes and their Disposal*

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers who are signatories to the following Trade Agreements:
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Tender Instructions
*All interested suppliers may submit a bid*
*The viewing of the vessel is mandatory and shall be held on October 5, 2022 at the Transport Canada-owned ferry terminal at Wood Islands, Prince Edward Island*
*See Part 2, article 2.5 for additional information*

### Contact Information
*Chantal Pilon, Phone (613) 894-1817, Email chantal.pilon@tpsgc.gc.ca*

### Tender Documents
*Tender documents may be obtained at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca*
